pageContext.claim: “Great News: BIG TEN FOOTBALL IS BACK. All teams to participate. Thank you to the players, coaches, parents, and all school representatives. Have a FANTASTIC SEASON! It is my great honor to have helped!!!”
pageContext.analysis: The president continued to misrepresent his role the 2020 Big Ten football season. Sports Illustrated reported “No media outlet is reporting Illinois, Michigan or Maryland is willing to sit out a winter or spring season” and that the governors of those states are not involved in deciding whether or not the schools will play. That decision is made by the Big Ten Conference presidents. An unnamed Big Ten university president told NBC News,“President Trump had nothing to do with our decision and did not impact the deliberations..In fact, when his name came up it was a negative because no one wanted this to be political.”
